tracks.summary: Design systems that survive huge scale, chaos, and human error.

quests.title: Topology & Blast Radius
quests.summary: Minimize the impact of component failure.
quests.objective: Design service topology, failure domains, and isolation boundaries (cells/shards) for a massive global service.

quests.title: Failure Modes & Runbooks
quests.summary: Predict how it breaks and write the manual to fix it.
quests.objective: Classify failure modes (e.g., latency, saturation, errors) and create actionable runbooks with escalation paths.

quests.title: Observability & Signals
quests.summary: See the system clearly through logs, metrics, and traces.
quests.objective: Design a complete signal strategy: SLOs/SLIs, error budgets, structured logging, and alert routing policy.

quests.title: Capacity, Deploys & Rollbacks
quests.summary: Ship code safely without falling over.
quests.objective: Define deployment strategies (blue/green, canary), auto-scaling policies, lock shedding, and circuit breaking.

quests.title: Incident Lifecycle & Postmortems
quests.objective: Map the full incident lifecycle: detection, mitigation, resolution, RCA, and the feedback loop to prevent recurrence.

bosses.title: Grid Resilience Warden
bosses.summary: Judges your ability to defend reliability against chaos, scale, and entropy.
